Name: Advanced Search Plus

Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Add a snippet, generally a javascript tracker, at the end of the public or admin pages, and allows to track json and xml requests.

Name: Annotate

Description: Automatically import a local or remote folder into Omeka as collections, items, files, and metadata.

Author: Daniel Berthereau, Omeka S port by BibLibre
Description: Keeps original names of imported files and put them in a hierarchical structure (collection / item / files) in order to get readable urls for files and to avoid an overloading of the file server.

Name: Ark
Author: BibLibre
Description: Create short, unique, meaningless, universal and persistent identifiers (ark and/or noid) and use them as urls for records.
